T01n872u_001:6: prāptaṃ tvayā jñānamanantadharmaṃ yenākariṣyaḥ sakalasya haityam || 2 ||
T01n872u_001:7: pravartitaṃ yena sudharmacakraṃ yasmin mahī sodadhiśailarājā |
T01n872u_001:8: ānanditeva calitā hyajasraṃ namo'stu tubhyaṃ tribhavādhipāya || 3 ||
T01n872u_001:9: yasmiṃśca vātāstriguṇena yuktā vavurnabhasto nipatanti vastrāḥ(rṣāḥ) |
T01n872u_001:10: vicitrapuṣpāṇi sugandhi vāri namo'stu tubhyaṃ jagadekanātha || 4 ||
T01n872u_001:12: jitaṃ tvayaikena nirāyudhena namo'stu tubhyaṃ balavartanāya || 5 ||
T01n872u_001:16: tuṣitāyuto janma cakāra martye namo'stu tubhyaṃ varabodhirāja || 7 ||
T01n872u_001:17: samyak pratijñāṃ pratikṛtya yena saṃpreṣyate mokṣapure janaughaḥ |
T01n872u_001:18: tadarthamāyāsi ca martyaloke namo'stu tubhyaṃ sumahatpratijña || 8 ||
T01n872u_001:19: yaścāṣṭakaṃ brahmakṛtaṃ supuṇyaṃ paṭhiṣyati śākyavarāgrataḥ sthaḥ |
T01n872u_001:20: duḥkhaṃ mahāpāpabhayaṃ ca hitvā śrīśrīghane yāsyati pattane mudā || 9 ||
